name: Till the End (Marijenburg)
description:
Here's the newest version from 15/5/22

Fight till the end and try to beat the best score!

This is a prototype I did for fun.
Your suggestions are welcome.
I probably will update this game but not for sure.

But I will for sure update the graphics and the sounds.

patch changes :

  • No minimum distance for enemies to shoot
  • Enemies can reach the same speed as the player
  • No more collisions between enemy bullets
